errors.error_description: The 'Dependencies' section omits `pyserial` from the list of required packages for a default install, even though it is required for serial interface functionality.
correction_candidates: Add `pyserial` to the list of dependencies.
Add `[pyserial](https://github.com/pyserial/pyserial)` to the list of dependencies.
Remove the entire paragraph that mentions using `rnspure` if `pyserial` is not supported.
Add a note saying `pyserial` is an optional dependency for serial port communication.
errors.golden_answer: Add `[pyserial](https://github.com/pyserial/pyserial)` to the list of dependencies.
